message: Bob, I'm offering you my product at a price of $1,750,000. This is a great opportunity to acquire a valuable asset. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. However, $1,400,000 is still a bit below what I'm looking for.  I'm willing to come down to $1,600,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product and the potential benefits it will bring you.
I'm getting closer to the price I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,500,000. This is the highest I'm willing to go.
